subject: The Peru quake.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I think Steve was getting voices about a quake, and I was, as well as the 
"Wolf" image. The wolf image tells me a quake is coming, but I never know 
where or when, same as the voices. They try but they said August 11th-and 
China.

Frank-S
